item.title: Cloud Security Posture Management: Top risks and best practice solutions
item.description:
Have you ever thought about the hidden risks behind cloud-native applications and how you can take a proactive approach to mitigating these risks across the development lifecycle? In this episode of the Uncovering Hidden Risks podcast, host Erica Toelle talks to Drew Nicholas, a Microsoft Principal Security Global Belt with in-depth experience as a cloud architect, and Daniela Villarreal a Sr. Product Marketing Manager for Microsoft Defender for Cloud.
